Subject: B3 - POC questions
Description:
Hello team,

We have a new potential costumer that want to work with the EPP on windows and linux. The main point is that most of the "linux" demand comes from the use of a WSL terminal in the windows OS. So they use only a terminal without any graphic interface and showed us some transfers that they want to block, does the EPP works on that case? Attaching a image to show an example.

Best regards,
What_We_Know__c:
We have provided the answers for 7 out of 8 questions. The one remaining has been addressed on EPP-team-solution-engineers
Teams channel.

We received the suggestion to raise a Feature Request for Bluetooth granularity on Linux.(https://netwrix.productboard.com/all-notes/notes/45559479)
Solution_Comment__c: We have answered 7 out of 8 questions and for the one remaining we have opened a feature request: https://netwrix.productboard.com/all-notes/notes/45559479
